New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 48th ODI century
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli sent a six soaring over midwicket for his 48th ODI century
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma was beaming at the end after a comprehensive win
Najmul Hossain Shanto admits his side are coming up short at the moment
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli was understandably delighted with the win and his own performance
Rohit Sharma remarked that the last three games that they played, their fielding has been superb
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pune crowd show their appreciation
The bad news was the injury to Hardik and India will have to wait on the result of the scan on his ankle
Bangladesh similarly were hurt by the injury to Shakib Al Hasan ahead of the game
